title: LF Gold/Plat Support Main for tourneys
body: Hellstorm Raiders is looking for sub/main support player, must be either gold or plat and have majority of weeknights free

replies.body: P4 Nami thresh blitz raka rakan etc.

Probably late to the party.
Gold 3 currently, IGN: Neojoke
Main Nautilus though i do play; Morgana, Rakan, Leona, Lux, Brand, Taric, Alister.
Keen to pick up, Pyke, Braum, Shen, Thresh (Already CAN play but would like to get better)

Hi I am interested i main supp , im plat 4 soloduo/flex I do not speak English very well as I am French but I am very motivated ADD me LVX Shane (im free all weeknight)
i main ZILEAN THRESH BRAUM LEONA (all support) but i can play carry supp as gragas velkoz xerath
